jpmp.device
Class UsbDevice

java.lang.Object
  jpmp.device.UsbDevice

public class UsbDevice
extends java.lang.Object

USB device implementation

Author:
cmi

Implement an USB devices

USB devices can be connected as MSC or MTP

Field Summary

getMetadata

public long getMetadata(java.lang.String pmpSource,
                        FileMetadata metadata)
Get metadata information for a file, only MTP. For MSC this method does nothing.

Parameters:
pmpSource - file to retrieved metadata for
metadata - metadata information retrieved
Returns:
0 if success

updateMetadata

public long updateMetadata(java.lang.String pmpSource,
                           FileMetadata metadata)
Update metadata information for a file, only MTP. For MSC this method does nothing.

Parameters:
pmpSource - file to update metadata
metadata - metadata information to update, only MTP.
Returns:
0 if success

getFile

public long getFile(java.lang.String localDest,
                    java.lang.String pmpSource,
                    IDeviceTransferNotifier notif)
Get a file from the USB device to local file system

Parameters:
localDest - local path destination (if the destination exists, it will be replaced)
pmpSource - file to get from the USB device
notif - transfer progress notifier
Returns:
0 if success

sendFile

public long sendFile(java.lang.String localSource,
                     java.lang.String pmpDestination,
                     IDeviceTransferNotifier notif,
                     FileMetadata metadata)
Send a file to the USB device

Parameters:
localSource - local path source file
pmpDestination - destination path on the USB device (if the destination exists, it will be replaced)
notif - transfer progress notifier
metadata - metadata information to associate with the file, only MTP. For MSC this is ignored.
Returns:
0 if success

parseFolder

public long parseFolder(java.lang.String pmpDestination,
                        IParseTreeNotifier notif)
Parse folder on the USB device

Parameters:
pmpDestination - path to parse on the USB device
notif - callback to get files and folders
Returns:
0 if success
